title: Understanding Sexual Abuse
text: Sexual abuse involves any form of sexual activity with a child, whether physical or exploitative.

title: Forms of Sexual Abuse
text: Consider the different forms of sexual abuse, such as exploitation, trafficking, and forced viewing of sexual activities.

hintAnswer: sexual intercourse or sexual touching of a child; sexual exploitation; human trafficking of a child; forced viewing of sexual activity; or permitting, allowing, or encouraging a child to engage in prostitution
title: Identifying Sexual Abuse
text: Which of the following is considered sexual abuse?
choices: sexual intercourse or sexual touching of a child; sexual exploitation; human trafficking of a child; forced viewing of sexual activity; or permitting, allowing, or encouraging a child to engage in prostitution
